page.title: 01FACTORIES IN HANDCROSS
page.content: In Handcross we have many businesses. B and W plating electroplate metal for shower taps and plugs.Mulick and Wurzel make chains,brooches and lockets.The chains are silver plated or gold plated.Diatek make drills which are covered in diamond dust for longer lasting use.Bredhurst electronics specialise in communications.They sell citizen band radios,car telephones and aerials.Worth engineering make metal pressings for washing machines,hoovers,fire alarms and many more but the largest firm which buy their pressings is Duracel batteries. The largest factory is Worth engineering.They employ 50 people.Bredhurst electronics employ 6 people.
